Irc server database handling class. More...

#include <kvi_ircserverdb.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void addNetwork (KviNetwork *n)
 Adds a network to the database.
KviPointerList< KviNetwork > * autoConnectOnStartupNetworks ()
 Returns a list of networks to connect on startup This list is computed when the data are loaded from disk during the startup and is used by KviApp to start the connections. The pointer is zero if there are no autoConnect networks. The list is valid only during the startup phase because it contains shallow pointers to the networks really contained in the server/network list and it is never updated later.
KviPointerList< KviServer > * autoConnectOnStartupServers ()
 Returns a list of servers to connect on startup This list is computed when the data are loaded from disk during the startup and is used by KviApp to start the connections. The pointer is zero if there are no autoConnect servers. The list is valid only during the startup phase because it contains shallow pointers to the servers really contained in the server/network list and it is never updated later.

KviPointerList<KviNetwork>* KviServerDataBase::autoConnectOnStartupNetworks (  )  [inline]

Returns a list of networks to connect on startup This list is computed when the data are loaded from disk during the startup and is used by KviApp to start the connections. The pointer is zero if there are no autoConnect networks. The list is valid only during the startup phase because it contains shallow pointers to the networks really contained in the server/network list and it is never updated later.

Returns:
KviPointerList<KviNetwork> *

Referenced by KviApp::autoConnectToServers(), and KviApp::createFrame().

The pointer is zero if there are no autoConnect servers. The list is valid only during the startup phase because it contains shallow pointers to the servers really contained in the server/network list and it is never updated later.
